snippet: Last month tied with September 2005 as the world’s warmest September on record, NOAA says.
abstract: Last month tied with September 2005 as the world’s warmest September on record, NOAA says.
lead_paragraph: Preliminary data show that the world’s average combined global land and ocean surface temperature last month tied with that of September 2005 as the warmest September since recordkeeping began, NOAA reports.
